name: The ATTACK of the ALIENS
description:
The ATTACK of the ALIENS

An entry to the 4th Alakajam!

Run! Upgrade! Entertain!

"What would happen to the Earth, if we would live in peace and harmony, and without the need of any army or a weapon, during an alien invasion?

Of course the media will come to our aid!"

Done within 48 hours!

All comments and reviews are welcome!
